caption.p:
Prediction of natural disordered regions in movement proteins (MPs) using VL‐XT PONDR software. PONDR plot of the disorder score for each of the MP amino acid residue of the tomato leaf curl New Delhi virus (ToLCNDV)‐OM (a), ToLCNDV‐CB (b), ToLCNDV‐OM
MP
(19E→G) (c), and ToLCNDV‐CB
MP
(19G→E) (d). The horizontal lines indicate the threshold for disorder prediction. The 19th amino acid is indicated by an arrow
